scripts.copy.ios: cp -R checkbox.*.js demo/node_modules/nativescript-checkbox && cd demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.copy.android: cp -R checkbox.*.js demo/node_modules/nativescript-checkbox && cd demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.buildrun: npm run build && cp -R checkbox.*.js demo/node_modules/nativescript-checkbox
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm run preparedemong && cd demo-ng && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm run preparedemong && cd demo-ng && tns run android --emulator
scripts.debug.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug ios
scripts.debug.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-checkbox && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.preparedemong: npm run build && cd demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-checkbox && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.nuke: rm -rf node_modules && cd demo && rm -rf node_modules platforms hooks && cd ../demo-ng && rm -rf node_modules platforms hooks && cd ..
